roleset.name: to strive to equal, compete with successfully
roleset.note: EMULATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'emulate' based on WSJ; nominal 'emulation' based on BOLT-7. (from emulate.01-v)
EMULATION-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from emulation.01-n)

example.name: transitive
example.text: Diamond-Star Motors Corp. , a joint venture of Chrysler Corp. and Mitsubishi Motors Corp. said [0] it-1 will begin [*-1]shipping Mitsubishi Eclipse cars to Japan next week , [*-1] emulating other Japanese auto ventures shipping U.S.-built vehicles back to Japan .
example.arg: other Japanese auto ventures shipping U.S.-built vehicles back to Japan

example.name: nominal rel: emulation
example.text: Though it has been said that the " Old Lei Feng " was more like a deity god , however , " God Lei Feng " and all those classic role models in emulation of him were not able to become philanthropists , and it was all because the public could not donate their excess assets to help others while they had to maintain a simple lifestyle at the same time . It was simply not possible to support individual acts of philanthropy back then .
